dependencies.description:
R is 'GNU S', a freely available language and environment for
statistical computing and graphics which provides a wide variety of
statistical and graphical techniques: linear and nonlinear modelling,
statistical tests, time series analysis, classification, clustering,
etc. Please consult the R project homepage for further information.
dependencies.name: r

dependencies.description:
Access the Bioconductor Project Package Repository. A convenient tool to
install and update Bioconductor packages.
dependencies.name: r-biocmanager
r-rlang

dependencies.description:
Supporting Functions for Packages Maintained by 'YuLab-SMU'.
Miscellaneous functions commonly used by 'YuLab-SMU'.
dependencies.name: r-yulab-utils

dependent_to.description:
statistical analysis and visualization of functional profiles for genes
and gene clusters. This package implements methods to analyze and
visualize functional profiles (GO and KEGG) of gene and gene clusters.
dependent_to.name: r-clusterprofiler

dependent_to.description:
Disease Ontology Semantic and Enrichment analysis. This package
implements five methods proposed by Resnik, Schlicker, Jiang, Lin and
Wang respectively for measuring semantic similarities among DO terms and
gene products. Enrichment analyses including hypergeometric model and
gene set enrichment analysis are also implemented for discovering
disease associations of high-throughput biological data.
dependent_to.name: r-dose

dependent_to.description:
Convert Plot to 'grob' or 'ggplot' Object. Convert plot function call
(using expression or formula) to 'grob' or 'ggplot' object that
compatible to the 'grid' and 'ggplot2' ecosystem. With this package, we
are able to e.g. using 'cowplot' to align plots produced by 'base'
graphics, 'ComplexHeatmap', 'eulerr', 'grid', 'lattice', 'magick',
'pheatmap', 'vcd' etc. by converting them to 'ggplot' objects.
dependent_to.name: r-ggplotify

dependent_to.description:
Scatter Pie Plot. Creates scatterpie plots, especially useful for
plotting pies on a map.
dependent_to.name: r-scatterpie

description:
R/Package Version Check. Check latest release version of R and R package
(both in 'CRAN', 'Bioconductor' or 'Github').
name: r-rvcheck

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
